mapper.update:
update dmi_organization
organization_name = #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
belongs_company_id = #{belongsCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag_filiale = #{flagFiliale,jdbcType=BIT},
business_license_id = #{businessLicenseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},

mapper.select:
select
,
from dmi_organization where belongs_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and level = 1 and flag_deleted = 0

,
from dmi_organization where belongs_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and level = 1 and flag_deleted = 0 and order_id = 1

select id, organization_name title, organization_code organizationCode, level, parent_id parentId, order_id orderId, belongs_company_id belongsCompanyId, flag_filiale flagFiliale, business_license_id businessLicenseId, flag_deleted flagDeleted, flag_available flagAvailable, create_time createTime, create_person createPerson, update_time updateTime, update_person updatePerson,0 flagIsStore from dmi_organization where belongs_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and flag_deleted = 0 order by level asc,parent_id asc,id asc,order_id asc

select store.id storeId, store.store_name title, organization.organization_code organizationCode, organization.level, organization.id parentId, organization.order_id orderId, organization.belongs_company_id belongsCompanyId, organization.flag_filiale flagFiliale, organization.business_license_id businessLicenseId, organization.flag_deleted flagDeleted, organization.flag_available flagAvailable, organization.create_time createTime, organization.create_person createPerson, organization.update_time updateTime, organization.update_person updatePerson, 1 flagIsStore from dmi_organization organization LEFT JOIN dmi_store store ON organization.id=store.area_id where organization.belongs_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and organization.flag_deleted = 0 and store.id is not null order by organization.level asc,organization.parent_id asc, organization.id asc,organization.order_id asc
